com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.cache

Class RailMemberCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.cache.RailMemberCache

  • public class RailMemberCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Cache that tracks what rail blocks trains are occupying, allowing for quick retrieval of train information that are on a particular rails block. This is used for wait distance functionality and when spawning trains. It is also used when a sign is activated by redstone, and the train that is on the rail coupled by it needs to be found.
